ygData.subject: The arrival of The Trainers
ygData.msgSnippet: A small space ship orbits Past Earth. Inside are five rogue bots who have come here for an important purpose. The ship begins to descend into the atmosphere.

Subject: The arrival of The Trainers

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

From: minime_316@...

A small space ship orbits Past Earth. Inside are five rogue bots who 
have come here for an important purpose. The ship begins to descend 
into the atmosphere. They try to come in for a peaceful landing in 
what would later become Bejing China, but the pilot miscalculated the 
land and their engines scraped along a huge boulder, leaving them 
inoperable. The ship lands with a small thud, now stuck. After a bit 
of yelling and blame, they activate the DNA Sample's they had 
previuosly collected. They emerge out of the ship and greet the day.

"What a great day for the trainers!!!"

The 5 bots, Prebon, Hammer, Blaze, Bullet and Ingnatius, or 
collectivly called The Trainers, have arrived on Past Earth. Prebon 
leads, with the form of a Tick. Hammer is second, with the form of a 
buffalo. Tracking Officer Blaze has the form of a Bengal. Bullet, the 
security officer, has the form of a Grizzly Bear. And finaly, 
Ignatius, the surveilance officer, has the form of an Eagle.

"Yes!" shouted Prebon, "Now we can harness the monsters energy and 
use it to cause moe pain than ever before. Come all! Inside! We start 
the search for the monster Savage in the morning!"

The Trainers have come to tame Savage, and use his force for their 
will. But the Trainers have another ability. To join together into 
the great robot Tamron. With his use Gaitling Guns and missle 
launchers, combined with Savage, nothing will stand in their way.
